an1.188-197:1.1: “The foremost of my monk disciples in seniority is Aññākoṇḍañña.
an1.188-197:6.1: … from eminent families is Bhaddiya Kāḷigodhāyaputta.
an1.188-197:7.1: … with a charming voice is Lakuṇṭaka Bhaddiya.
an1.188-197:8.1: … with a lion’s roar is Piṇḍolabhāradvāja.
an1.188-197:9.1: … who speak on the teaching is Puṇṇa Mantāṇiputta.
an1.188-197:10.1: … who explain in detail the meaning of a brief statement is Mahākaccāna.”
